title: The Old Pappy Cocktail
directions: Place cherry, orange slice, bitters, and simple syrup into highball glass; muddle. Fill glass with ice. Pour whiskey and sour mix into glass. Cover glass with a shaker; shake until chilled, about 30 seconds. Pour cocktail and ice back into the highball glass; top with soda water.
ingredients: 3 fluid ounces clear whiskey (such as Kings County Distillery Moonshine)
